snippet: Switzerland's world number four Stan Wawrinka has pulled out the tennis competition at the Rio Olympics because of injury, he said in a statement to the Swiss Tennis Federation on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Switzerland's world number four Stan Wawrinka has pulled out the tennis competition at the Rio Olympics because of injury, he said in a statement to the Swiss Tennis Federation on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Pulls Out of Rio Games Due to Injury: Swiss Tennis
headline.main: Wawrinka Pulls Out of Rio Games Due to Injury: Swiss Tennis
